website_summaries.verdict: We cannot recommend a $650 blender with such a glaring design flaw.
pros: Blendtec's motor is about as powerful as you can get in a countertop blender
The touch interface is more refined than in previous models, offering precision blending controls
cons: It didn't take long for the Blendtec to shred the rubber gasket at the bottom of the jar, rendering it more or less unusable

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever! Does everything, no issues. If you live a healthy lifestyle, this is a must have...juices, protein shakes are a daily occurance in my house. Plus, it grinds grains to flours, saving a lot of money, makes home made ice creams, soups, salsas, sauces, the list is endless. So easy to use, love the digital display, keeps track of uses, it's amazing! Better than the Vitamix, the power is incredible. No buyer's regret at all... you'll have it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Abby S.

customer_reviews.title: Blown away
customer_reviews.text: Wife went from burning out one blender after another to having the must powerful indestructible blender ever. She uses it at least twice a day easiest blender ever to clean and it doesn't make that burning smell when you make a smoothie fro she uses it at least twice a day easiest blender ever to clean and it doesn't make that burning smell when you make a smoothi
customer_reviews.author: trevor mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this blender.  It does it all and then some more.
customer_reviews.text: This model Designer 725 exceeded my expectations. It is truly amazing. I can NOT find any fault with it so far. I just hope it last for a long time, because I paid more for it than when I first started looking into purchasing a blender. But I am very glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. P.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: We use it every day. Motor kicks like a donkey.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Snell

customer_reviews.title: So it could cut through Vegetables better.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the blades were sharp. So it could cut through Vegetables better.
customer_reviews.author: MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A bit noisy, but compensates for how fast it is. Looks nice, and I use it every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Butler

customer_reviews.title: It is worth to spend the money
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Love it! It makes my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb T.

customer_reviews.title: BUILT LIKE A BEAST
customer_reviews.text: Two months into using it almost every day and this machine is a beast. blends fruits and vegetables no problem even Kale which is tough to blend. Extremely high quality. I bought the 45 ounce jar for one person and its perfect. The technology is top notch. I'd buy it again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Love the Blentec
customer_reviews.text: Love the Blentec, we had a horrible experience with one of the other popular blenders and Blendec was very patient and understanding. we use this blender to puree foods thin enough to feed our son whom has a feeding tube. If you are in the market for a great blender with ease of mind this is the one. Blendtec Customer service is impeccable
customer_reviews.author: Linette W

customer_reviews.title: Crushes anything like a champ
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blender around. I researched for quite awhile before deciding to drop this kind of money on a blender and it has been well worth it. I make smoothies daily (sometimes more than once a day) and have had a hard time finding a blender that didn't die after 6 months. The blendtec far exceeds my expectations. I love that it has little messages on the control screen and that it keeps a running tally of the amount of blends. It was packaged very well. In would definitely buy from blendtec again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sexiest blender you can buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Blends anything you throw at it with authority. I don’t regret buying it for a second.
customer_reviews.author: BrockB

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money - great blender!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender! Makes the best and easiest smoothies. Great for crushing ice. Note: if want crushed ice, just pulse for one or two seconds - if want “snow” ice, run for 5 or 6 seconds. Have not tried all the features yet but feel sure they will work just as well. Expensive - yes. Worth it - absolutely!
customer_reviews.author: PMartin

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT make tomato soup !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is only the third time I used the blender, did a great job, but now the lid and wildside container is STAINED from hot tomato soup. I make this every year at the end of the season with garden tomatoes. I planned on leaving the blender out on my counter but not NOW.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome blender. Not cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome blender. Not cheap, but worth it. I initially hesitated to buy because of a few reviewers mentioning a shredding gasket issue. I did not experience anything of that nature and we are part 150 blends now. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: My Chinese blender beats this one and only cost $150
customer_reviews.author: Rightonjeff

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blender. Easy to use. Loud, but not too loud. The lid must be put on carefully, down all the way, all around the jar, which is not difficult; too avoid a leak while blending. Like the electronic read out. I bought a warehouse deals blender, and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: 14 months second blender and 2nd engine to blow. ...
customer_reviews.text: 14 months second blender and 2nd engine to blow. Burns black rubber into smoothie. I'd expect this from a cheaper blender, but for the price this is totally unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Blendtec blender
customer_reviews.text: Fast and efficient Blender! A must have if you make smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: The Heidens

customer_reviews.title: Power! But early failure
customer_reviews.text: sturdy. Super powerful but got a code 4 failure after not much use
customer_reviews.author: Real shopper

customer_reviews.title: if you like warm, watered down
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this blender. I received this as a gift. Did my research first and asked for this model based on reviews. My blender was not purchased through Amazon, but another reputable website. Basically, if you like warm, watered down, tasteless smoothie juice, you'll love it. Can't make ANYTHING without "cavitation." Bought the smaller jar. No different. Informed of all the fixes. Not helping. Customer Service is horrible. Reps must be trained to respond to complaints with obnoxious I don't care responses. I expect my motor will die soon. Too expensive for the lack of performance. Sorry honey- wish I love it but I don't. Not your fault.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: After 75 blends I received the now infamous "Error: ...
customer_reviews.text: After 75 blends I received the now infamous "Error: touch controller self-test failed" and that was the end of the blender.... Never had this issue with any other brand of blender. I expected more from a blender of this price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I bought Designer Series 725 at Bed Bath & Beyond ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought Designer Series 725 at Bed Bath & Beyond at 20% discount about a week ago. Today it stopped working. I am getting an error that control panel self test failed . I tried a few things to make it work again , but nothing worked. Seems other users are having same issue. Also , it is shaky on a counter and needs 2 cycles to make a smoother smoothie . I replaced the faulty piece and god another one from BBB. This one too is throwing errors on the control panel. Even after shutting the blender several times, it would not work. It is junk
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Really? Expensive blender that does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Initial setup gave error code....””Error: Touch controller self-test failed.” Which is not a good start when paying this amount of money for a blender. I then wanted to exchange it for a new one, but Amazon only allowed me to return it. I went to purchase a replacement and its $70 more now. I recommend you spend a little more time researching and reviewing the blenders that are available before spending $600 for a bum Blendtec blender.
customer_reviews.author: chad balash

product_meta.title: Blendtec Designer 725 Blender - WildSide+ Jar (90 oz) - Professional-Grade Power - Self-Cleaning - 6 Pre-Programmed Cycles - 100-Speeds - Sleek and Slim - Gunmetal
product_meta.description: Color:GunmetalLet’s talk about time for a moment, it’s the one thing in life that is given equally to everyone. Regardless of our circumstances, jobs, or family commitments we all have exactly 24 hours to use each day. Time is precious and fleeting. It will not wait for any of us to use it up or share with others. Cooking meals and cleaning dishes takes effort and a lot of time. Day-after-day meals need to be made, and then the cleanup begins. It’s a necessary part of life. Blendtec blenders significantly reduce meal prep time and cleanup. When you buy a Blendtec blender you’re not only buying the world’s most advanced blender, you’re also buying yourself more time. How can a blender give you more time? It comes down to technology and design. Our advanced technology and jar design create a vortex, which pulls food towards the blade instead of pushing it to the sides of the jar like our competitors. With Blendtec jars, you won’t waste time tending your blends with a tamper to get all the ingredients down into the blades, and no tamper means one less thing to clean when you’re done. Blendtec blenders can also heat your food during the blend cycle. For instance, if you want soup for dinner, a Blendtec blender can blend it up and heat it up at the same time so it’s ready to serve straight from the blender jar. No need to heat your soup in a pan. Can your old blender do that? No pan and no additional heating time means less cleanup. Not only can Blendtec blenders heat your food, they can also make ice cream. Actual ice cream can be made with the exact same blender that makes soup. Drinks, appetizers, main courses, and desserts can all be made with the same blender using the same jar. The time it takes to make each course could be measured in seconds not minutes or hours. Cleanup for an entire multi-course meal could be as simple as pushing the pre-programmed, self-cleaning button to wash a single jar, and just like that, you’ll be done. There is a reason that having the world's most technologically advanced blender is worth every penny, it gives you more time to focus on life and the people who matter to you. Every Blendtec is professional-grade with one of the most powerful motors in the industry, one of the longest warranties in the business, and fashion-forward industrial designs that look great on your countertop. Blendtec blenders are the most advanced blenders you can buy. Engineered and manufactured at our Headquarters in Orem, Utah. The Blendtec Designer 725 gives you seamless precision speed control for 100 speeds with the slide of a finger. It even tells you which speed to use for stirring, chopping, mixing, blending, or pureeing. Use Multi-Speed Pulse for an added burst of power at any speed. The Blendtec Designer 725 is truly the blender with a brain. Our exclusive SmartBlend technology senses and identifies potential problems that could interfere with your blend-including loading errors, overheating, or air pockets - and then tells you how to fix them. Six preprogrammed custom cycles enable one-touch blending: Smoothie, Salsa, Ice Cream, Whole Juice, Hot Soup, and Clean. The Blendtec Designer 725 even suggests additional uses for each cycle so you know how to get the most from your blender.
feature_bullets: Program Settings: Six preprogrammed cycles with smart blend technology (Smoothies, Dips, Ice Cream, Juice, Hot Soups, and Self-Cleaning). Smart blend technology senses and identifies potential problems that could interfere with the perfect blend, including loading errors, or air pockets and then tells the user to fix them.

Speed Control/Smart Blending: 100 speeds giving the ultimate in precise control. Blender prompts user when more liquid must be added. Graphic OLED with four languages (English, Spanish, French and German) displaying cycle details. Easy to clean touch screen control is intuitive and attractive.
Noise Reduction: Reduced motor noise due to acoustic damping material and internal sound baffling.

Patented Blade/80% Thicker: Stainless-Steel forged blade, with wings, for amazingly smooth blends (10X stronger than other blender blades). Note: Blade is not sharp, blade is dull. No more cuts and pokes.
Large Batches: BPA-Free WildSide+ Jar is a 90 ounce volume jar with 36 ounce blending capacity (wet or dry) ideal for blending beverages for 4-6 people.
8 year /American Company: Family-owned and driven to build the best quality products - without compromise. Engineered and assembled in the USA.
Electrical Ratings: Watt 1800, Volts 120, Hz 50-60, Amp 15, Cord: feet 35inches/3 feet
